synopsis.p: Selects most relevant keywords in documents.

description.p: selects the most relevant keywords in documents. The candidate keywords are specified with evaluated as a list of elements with the document as the context element. The keyword text is specified by .
ranks the keywords according to the function, then selects the keywords with the highest value. The selected keywords are stored in the document feature , and the corresponding scores in .

param-doc.name: active
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a boolean with the corpus as context element. If the result is false, then the module does not process the module.

param-doc.name: scoreFunction
param-doc.p: Function to use for ranking keywords. Available functions include the keyword frequency, different variants of tf-idf and Okapi BM25.

param-doc.name: keywords
param-doc.p: Expression evaluated as a list of elements with the document as the context element. Each element represents a keyword of the document.

param-doc.name: scoreFeature
param-doc.p: Document feature where to store the score of selected keywords computed by .

param-doc.name: keywordForm
param-doc.p: Text of the keyword. This expression is evaluated as a string with the keyword element as the context.

param-doc.name: keywordFeature
param-doc.p: Document feature where to store the selected keywords.

param-doc.name: userFunctions
param-doc.p: Set user functions available for this module. If this module is a sequence, then all compounds inherit its functions.
